name: OR_CASE_IMP_TRAY
description: This table contains the implant trays information for the surgical case (ORC) record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedural case record.

columns.name: IMP_TRAY_ID
columns.description: Specifies the implant trays to be used in this surgery.

columns.name: IMP_TRAY_DEFAULT_YN
columns.description: Specifies whether this implant tray was defaulted by the system, or added/edited by the user.

columns.name: IMPL_TRAY_REQ_YN
columns.description: Holds whether the implant tray is required

columns.name: IMP_TRAY_CMT
columns.description: A free-text comment about an implant tray.
